short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows WGU students to see the grades they made on Object Assessments and Pre-Assessments on my.wgu.edu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a percentage next to competency adjective so you can know what you actually made on a WGU exam without digging through the html!
